FAQs
Q: How do I listen? 
Step 1. Be sure that both the SXM and Alexa apps are installed. 
Step 2. Enable the SXM skill in the Alexa App. 
Step 3. Agree to link SiriusXM to Alexa. 
Step 4. Ask Alexa to play your favorite genre, channel, or show by name or number “on SiriusXM.” 
 
Q: Can I stream on two devices at the same time?
Streaming is limited to just one Echo Dot or other device at a time, per subscription. A second device using the same subscription can cause the first device to stop playback.

Music and radio skills may occasionally include strong profanity and sexual or suggestive themes. If you are unable to tune to any content on demand, ensure that the Explicit Language Filter is set to OFF in the Alexa app. Note: With Explicit Filter ON, Alexa will not play: Channels with Mature content or any Artist Radio Stations or Podcasts.
